full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO YID BZHIN NOR BU'I SGRUB THABS BSKANG BSHAGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I SGRUB THABS BSKANG BSHAGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, THU MED BE'I SI'I SHOG RAB 'BYAMS PA DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO DANG, DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'OD ZER DANG, HAR CHIN HU THA RANG PE'I SI'I SHOG BKRA SHIS MKHYEN RAB GSUM GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^RNAL 'BYOR PA ^DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O,,)
